item.title: Setup new macOS
item.description: Install Apps Via Mac Store wechat iWork Pages Numbers keynote mindNode YoudaoDict QQ MUSIC Slack Via Browser v2rayU: https://github.com/yanue/V2rayU/releases brew https://docs.brew.sh/Installation /bin/bash -c "$(curl -fsSL https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Homebrew/install/master/install.sh)" Chrome: https://www.google.com/chrome BaiduPan: https://pan.baidu.com/download#pan Creative Cloud Installer: https://account.adobe.com/?lang=en telegram: https://desktop.telegram.org/ qq doc: https://docs.qq.com/desktop/ filezilla: https://filezilla-project.org/download.php?platform=osx host: sftp://example.com, iTerm2: https://iterm2.com/downloads.html Vscode: https://code.visualstudio.com/Download NetEase Music: https://music.163.com/#/download ClashX Pro: https://install.appcenter.ms/users/clashx/apps/clashx-pro/distribution_groups/public Via brew neovim: brew install --HEAD neovim Set up Enable Chrome Download list layout: chrome://flags/ -> enable Enable download bubble
